MemeDef.label: Tu'whacca Cult
MemeDef.description: The traditional Redguard religion focused on Tu'whacca, the Tricky God who guides souls to the Far Shores. This faith emphasizes honor in combat, proper burial rites, and the journey to the afterlife.

li.name: Tu'whacca
li.description: The Tricky God who guides Redguard souls to the Far Shores after death.

li.name: Tall Papa
li.description: The first spirit and creator deity of the Redguards, father of all spirits.

li.name: HoonDing
li.description: The Make Way God, who helps the Redguards in times of great need.

MemeDef.label: Hammerfell Syncretism
MemeDef.description: A blended faith combining traditional Redguard beliefs with Imperial religious practices. This syncretic approach allows Redguards to maintain cultural identity while participating in the broader Imperial religious framework.

li.name: Arkay
li.description: The god of the cycle of life and death, known to Redguards as Tu'whacca.

li.name: Akatosh
li.description: The Dragon God of Time, respected as the chief deity of the Imperial cult.

li.name: Talos
li.description: The divine hero-god Tiber Septim, founder of the Third Empire.

li.name: HoonDing
li.description: The traditional Redguard Make Way God, integrated into the broader pantheon.

MemeDef.label: Sword-Singer Mysticism
MemeDef.description: A mystical warrior philosophy centered on the ancient art of sword-singing. This path combines martial excellence with spiritual discipline, seeking to achieve the legendary blade mastery of the Ansei.

li.name: Frandar Hunding
li.description: The legendary sword-saint who founded the principles of sword-singing.

li.name: Divad Hunding
li.description: Son of Frandar Hunding and great warrior who led the Ra Gada to Hammerfell.

li.name: The Sword-Saint
li.description: The idealized perfect Ansei, representing the ultimate achievement of sword-singing.

MemeDef.label: Yokudan Ancestor Worship
MemeDef.description: The ancient spiritual traditions of Yokuda, focusing on honoring the ancestors and maintaining connection with the spirits of the departed. This faith emphasizes bloodline honor and ancestral wisdom.

li.name: The First Ancestor
li.description: The progenitor spirit from whom all Redguard bloodlines descend.

li.name: Blade-Bearer
li.description: The ancestral spirit who first taught the ways of the sword to mortals.

li.name: Desert-Walker
li.description: The ancestral spirit who guided the people through the harsh deserts.
